column3: message  jermaine  from  the man drake puts it the fuck down hes doing his thing hes got the hottest mixtape on the streets its early its nasty hes putting it the fuck down you know what im sayin' listen to that shit do your thing aiiight  message  yo yo yo this is your boy christopher  thats right  chilling with my main man drake on the offthehook from this tape you know how we get down thats how we do it the real house party baby lets go lets go lets go  message  yo nigga whats up this is glenn lewis man had to holla at my boy drake the incomparable illustrious lyrical genius hailing from the one and only toronto upnorth throwed niggas pay attention how my nigga get down drake let em have it man 06 you know how we doing it this year we doing it big man we 'bout to set this whole country on fire 'bout to put this place on the map lets get it
